attributes.additional_details:
I call for a one strike rule be brought in place for immigrants to the united kingdom.
The UK welcomes immigrants wanting to work hard and build a better life for their family, contributing to our economy and integrating peacefully within british culture, but living in britain you must live by our laws and respect our values.
Any immigrant found guilty of an offence should be immediately deported back to country of origin. This would save the taxpaying public £40,000 per year for EACH prisoner (minus airfare out of britain) and will reduce the number of foreign criminals which, at present, plague our shores.
